CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 13, 1954, pg. 10, reads: "'THANK YOU, JUDGE' - Mrs. Jayne Lewis Williams of the Smoky City Guild, expresses 'thanks' in behalf of her organization and the Smoketowners to Judge Homer S. Brown of Allegheny Court, for purchasing the first pair of tickets to the clubs' informal charity benefit, a 'Golden Nocturne Dance,' which will be held in beautiful Golden Room of the Gateway Plaza, Saturday evening, Nov. 27. The occasion was in the judge's chamber in the courthouse. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Jayne Lewis Williams and Judge Homer S. Brown holding tickets to Smoky City Guild benefit, in Brown's chambers
